CONTRACT_ID: As per the provided data, there is no direct way to obtain a unique id for this contract, however, the reference number for this contract is PW-22-01004350.
description: NOTICE OF AMENDMENT The Advance Procurement Notice was amended to state that the RFSA will be published in December 2022 or January 2023. NOTICE OF QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS 1. The document "Questions and Answer - Questions et r\u00e9ponses - (Part 3 - partie 3)" has been published. NOTICE OF QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS 1. The document "Questions and Answers - Questions et r\u00e9ponses - (Part 2 - partie 2)" has been published. OBJECTIVE The aim of this advance notice is to inform interested original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) of UPS batteries and OEM\u2019s approved resellers that Shared Services Canada (SSC) will be publishing a solicitation in May 2022 for replacement batteries for UPSs meeting one or more of the following characteristics: \u2022 rack mounted single phase, 5kVA capacity or greater \u2022 rack mounted three phase 5kVA capacity or greater \u2022 stand alone single phase 5kVA capacity or greater \u2022 stand alone three phase 5kVA capacity or greater. The replacement batteries will be delivered to sites across Canada.
